mean_en: to separate or make something separate into parts; to separate something into parts and give a share to each of a number of different people, etc.; to use different parts of your time, energy, etc. for different activities, etc.; to separate two people or things
sentence: The apple is divided into two equal parts.
sentence_trans: 这个苹果被平分成了两半。
word_etyma: di分开 + vide分开 → 分开 → divide分开
